title: TodoWrite Todo Schema
description: Schema for validating todo snapshots created by the TodoWrite tool

timestamp.description: ISO8601 timestamp when the todo snapshot was created

session_id.description: Unique identifier (UUID v4) for the agent session

cwd.description: Current working directory path when todos were created

todos.description: Array of todo items tracking work items for the session

TodoItem.title: Todo Item
TodoItem.description: A single todo item with content, status, and active form

content.description: Todo content in imperative form (e.g., 'Fix the bug', 'Add feature')

status.description: Current status of the todo item

activeForm.description: Present continuous form of the todo (e.g., 'Fixing the bug', 'Adding feature')
